Hi Sudipa,

The case is currently with our R&D team to review the logs.  I will inform you the moment I received feedback. 
In the meanwhile, I would recommend that you upgrade the EPP clients to the latest version which was released with Endpoint Protector 5.9.4.0, currently there is a small mismatch as the EPP clients currently installed ( v6.2.2.1006 ) are from Endpoint Protector Server version 5.9.3.0.
To ensure optimum performance please aligned the EPP Client version to the EPP Server version.

Please follow below steps to upgrade your Endpoint Protector clients to the latest software version currently available on your server:

	Click on "System Configuration" > "Client Software Upgrade".



 

	Select the computers that you wish to upgrade (Instead of selecting all, select about 100) and then click on "Next"




 

	Confirm the upgrade job and click on "Start Upgrade Job"




Could you give the above steps a try and let us know if the upgrade process was successful and also if another incident occurred on EPP Client version 6.2.3.1010 please?



Kind regards
